results.freeFormatComment: for the twelve months ended 31 may 2014, cdmuk recorded ebita of 02 million, and an operating loss of 04 million after amortisation of goodwill of 06 million total revenues were 197 million, of which 129 million was attributable to records management, 64 million to scanning services and 04 million to nontransferring revenues the net assets of cdmuk as at 31 may 2014 were 192 million
